tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ***** ******* ************* **** *** ** * ***** **** ** ************ **** ** ***** That the fact that we were regularly consulting her regarding abnormal bleeding that my wife was suffering yet she did not even once mention that my wife should do a pregnancy test even when, as we found out, all the signs were of a complication already present. She kept treating my wife for hormonal imbalance and it led to a situation where had it not been a stroke of rare luck, I would have lost my wife in the middle of a highway 200km away from our home. 
It was Dr, Leena Sridhar we had consulted all through our first pregnancy and we welcomed our daughter through a C-Section on July 11, 2021. After delivery her periods were regular but after 10 months she suffered with intense bleeding with clots, we immediately went to Dr. Leena and explained the status and she briefly mentioned about the hormonal changes that occur after pregnancy and also recommended to get few tests done along with ultrasound. On June 6, 2022, we showed the reports to Dr. Leena Sreedhar and she stuck to her diagnosis that it was a hormonal issue and treatable. Again, my wife asked for the pregnancy doubt, mentioned clots on which she mentioned that no it is because of the hormonal issues and all the reports are clear. She prescribed to continue the medication for hormonal issue only and visit again once the bleeding stops. But it didn’t stop despite taking the medicines. Trusting our doctor, we stayed on the medicines she had given us and while on the grounds the bleeding never stopped (spotting one day and heavy bleeding other days). But it was when we went a weekend trip to Jaipur, things started becoming more and more troublesome. My wife started suffering from more and more bleeding including the clots during the journey, but by the time we reached Jaipur, it had stopped, and we decided to wait for the night to see if it returned. Thankfully, the night went by somehow and the next morning, we immediately decided to head back to Delhi and visit Dr. Leena since the situation seemed abnormal. 
However, the next few hours turned out to be absolute nightmare to us, my wife had started bleeding profusely, and we rushed back towards delhi, however my wife had started to go unconcious due to all this bleeding and had it not been our extreme good luck of finding *** **** hospital nearby, my wife would have been dead. We had tried calling and sending pictures to her on whatsapp but her response was cold and not helpful at all. *** ***** ******* ********* **** ** **** ** ***** ** ***** ** *** ****** ** ******** 

PLEASE BEWARE. STAY AWAY FROM MANIPAL HOSPITALS AND DR. LEENA SRIDHAR ** *** **** ** **** *** ***** ** **** ***** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We  have visited Dr. Leena Sreedhar for my High risk pregency ( 39 years, 3rd c- section ,ivf - twins ).  Our pregency was very precious for us because we had lost our 2 babies in neonatal stage from previous 2 c- sections ( some other Doctor ). Dr. Leena Sreedhar understood our situation in our first visit itself with great patience. I was very comfortable to tell all my doubts regarding ivf medicines which I was given in my ivf treatment. She is speaking God to us - whose words give hopes & actions creates happy families. We like Dr. Leena Sreedhar a lot.  I was worried about my 3rd c - section, but with Dr .Leena Sreedhar everything was very comfortable. We are blessed by twin babies. Thanks for all the help she has done & thanks for her blessings. Now we are consulting paediatrician in the same hospital, Dr. Leena shreedhar is  in the same floor, whenever she is walking in lobby & sees us, she will come & see the babies, which we like the most.                                                                                             To,                                                                                       Dr. Leena Sreedhar,.                                                           
                                   Thanks for all the help u have done & thanks for your blessings. You are speaking God to us. We  ( my husband & me) will not forget in our life time  . My husband, my mother, my father & myself likes u a lot. Thanks & bye.                                                                                 With Best Regards,.                                                          Rashmi Rajeeva & Rajeeva Ananth.
reply_text: I am overwhelmingly happy to see you and the twins Rashmi....God bless you and the sweet family!!

review: I chose Dr. Leena for my pregnancy journey after having 2 unfortunate experiences earlier. She came as a rescuer for me and enabled me to convert my high risk pregnancy at 39 years age to a low risk normal delivery. She is sound technically and will explain you logically without any sugar coating. She is straight forward whether things are positive or not positive but her intentions are to always make things right for you and I was well disciplined and compliant to her suggestions. She and her team and Heena the assistant are well coordinated. The only thing i found missing was non availability of her contact number outside of hospital visit, in case of any urgent queries.. My son and family will always be grateful to Leena mam for the joy she has brought to our lives. I recommend her !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
Dr Leena Have been like a second mom to us ( me and my wife) . She is someone we can tell anything and ask anything. Thank you for being such an important person in our life and assisting us since last 4 years. 

Today we are proud parents of two ( 3.5 years toddler and eight month infant) under her medical as well as emotional guidance. 

Though we may not meet for pregnancy again 😂 but we will keep meeting you .

Last but not least kudos to her entire team who helped us always.
reply_text: God bless you both and the kids!!would love to meet the family anytime!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very arrogant & rude doctor I have ever seen in my life***** ******* **** **** *** ** **** ** ********* My wife is six months pregnant and dr.leena & dr.geetanjali ****** ******* ** giving ** ***** information about our child that the baby has down syndrome and you should get these tests done. **** **** *********** ** ** **** **** ** ****** ********** So just to cross check them we got ultrasound done from somewhere else *** ** **** ********* ** ****** *** ******* **** *** **** ** ********** ******* ***** **** ********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Im not satisfied with dr consultantion. I had my test reports of herpes positive. * ** *** **** *** ********* ***** ***** I was very panic. I thought doctor will help me to relax and worry free. But that was my false assumption. Im 37 years old and single. Her coordinator calling me by Mrs sonia. I feel that she is jocking on me. 
Doctor was speaking in high English and I'm not getting her point. If I ask question then she explain otherwise she was quit. The doctor was not explained my diagnosis in detail. I was disappointed.

Good doctor but...

Booked consultation with doctor as per the suggested date on the prescription.
Paid full consultation fees.
Entered doctor’s room.
Doctor: You were not supposed to visit today. Please visit next week.
Left room.
 
Protested to billing staff against ‘paying full consultation fees’ to just hear ‘Please Visit next week’, but in vain!

P.S. Doctor is without doubt, very good.

Very bad experience. She doesn’t listen to you and is just keen to put her point across. (I overheard other patients say the same thing) If it’s a paid follow-up, she will see you else she will get irritated if you insist to talk. Also, if you do decide to consult her, please record the session because ma’am hates to repeat what she’s already spoken. She leaves quite the guidance and talking to her nurses as well so sometimes you feel your being treated by the nurses.
reply_text:
MTP with tablets for a twin pregnancy at this gestation is not advisable and safer method of DNC was suggested to you which you didnt want to listen.
I can assure you that i always suggest what is in a patients good interest.
I shall always be there for a follow up consultation and you may share your problems anytime!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
**** **** **** *** **** ****** ** ****** On my very first appointment she was very warm but when I returned with my lab reports she was extremely unsympathetic. She pointed all the errors and just said things like “these are not good signs” without explaining further what can be done or without even saying no need to panic.
**** ******** **** **** ***** ***** ********** ****** She was upset with me that I didn’t get my tests done from the hospital lab!!!
I would not recommend this lady. ***** *** ********** ****** ******* *** ******
reply_text: Lab reports from non NABH Labs are not reliable..therefore variations and inaccuracies have to be pointed out

reply_text: You seem to have had a bad time...paperless reporting of tests being done in covid times..have been successfully handling high risk pregnancies for last 32years...please feel free to visit me anyday to clarify your apprehensions
